comment.author: 24469639@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Geotagged : Vintage photographs, and we'd love to have this and any other geotagged vintage photos added to the group!

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Is it possible to up the resolution on this pic? Here's a few interesting pics - nla.gov.au/nla.news-article63512354 ; nla.gov.au/nla.news-article63169680 ; nla.gov.au/nla.news-page5408495 ; and a sad but beautiful poem which despite its flaws might find a certain resonance - nla.gov.au/nla.news-article60848623

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: This is the smallest of three sizes we put on our Catalog - try the largest size at : acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemPopLarger.aspx?itemid=412199
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Thanks for pointing me to the larger image. I love the detail of daily life which is so often caught in these 19th century pics, and which becomes more evident in the larger sized images.
